sources.title: The Royal Bed
sources.description: Title: The Royal Bed Summary: The hapless king of a small European nation must put up with a domineering queen, a daughter who wants to elope with her boyfriend, a peasant revolt and a scheming son who wants to be king ... Directed by: Lowell Sherman Actors: Lowell Sherman, Mary Astor, Anthony Bushell Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 15 January 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 The hapless king of a small European nation must put up with a domineering queen, a daughter who wants to elope with her boyfriend, a peasant revolt and a scheming son who wants to be king himself and is plotting to take advantage of the situation.

sources.title: Royal bed (1931) [Colorized,4k,60fps]
sources.description: Royal bed is a 1931 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com/   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: The Royal Bed (1931)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. Lowell Sherman directed and starred in this comedy about a princess who wishes to marry a commoner. Critics of the time appreciated it quite a bit, it was also a hit with audiences who made it a box office hit, though for modern audiences the memory of the film has been a bit easier to forget.  I'm uploading two versions here, one with a watermark in the upper right corner for the length of the film, and another with considerably worse quality of video and sound.

sources.title: The Royal Bed (1931) MARY ASTOR
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX FREE FULL MOVIES
Stars: Lowell Sherman, Mary Astor, Hugh Trevor 
Director: Lowell Sherman
Writer: Robert E. Sherwood (play)

In this Pre-code Comedy, the hapless king of a fictional European nation must put up with a domineering queen, a scheming son, a daughter who wants to elope, and a peasant revolt. Based on Robert E. Sherwood's play "The Queen's Husband."

sources.title: The Royal Bed (1931) Mary Astor | Pre-Code, Comedy Full Length Movie
sources.description:
The hapless king of a small European nation must put up with a domineering queen, a daughter who wants to elope with her boyfriend, a peasant revolt and a scheming son who wants to be king 

Director: Lowell Sherman
Writers: J. Walter Ruben, Robert E. Sherwood 
Stars: Lowell Sherman, Mary Astor, Anthony Bushell
